howToContentDescription1: Sam is a digital assistant that makes your job application easier.
howToContentTitle2: What does Sam do for you?
howToContentDescription2: Sam happily answers all your questions about a job opening. Additionally, Sam will ask you some basic questions to see if the job suits you.
howToContentDescription3:
Chatting with Sam is anonymous. At the end of the conversation, you choose whether or not to leave your contact details.

Sam is an AI chatbot and can make mistakes.
